Describe
--------

Some extras commands to Flask-Script.


.. :changelog:

Changelog

change logs.


0.1.1~4 (2015-09-11~18)
-----------------------

- fix docs.


0.1.0 (2015-09-11)
------------------

- add Celery Command.
